messages.title: It's a two horse race
messages.content: The SNP and Conservatives are a distant third and cannot win in Glasgow North. Supporting them just helps Labour. Only Labour or Lib Dems can win.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work to stop school closures and Post Office closures; support for Save Otago Lane.

mentions.candidate: Local Lib Dem campaigner Katy Gordon
mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race in Glasgow North. The SNP and Conservatives are a distant third and cannot win in Glasgow North.

housing.content: Work alongside parents off the side in Hyndland and Clouston.

politicalExperience.achievements: Saved Kelvinide Post Office and helped residents in Hyndland and Clouston; fought alongside parents against school closures; worked to gain over 15,000 people to give their support for the Save Otago Lane campaign.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RTHZ-AHAU-YLGX, Katy Gordon, Glasgow North Lib Dems, 21 Orleans Ave, Glasgow, G14 9LA

images.caption: Local Lib Dem campaigner Katy Gordon speaking with a resident

leaflet.additionalNotes: This leaflet positions the election as a two-horse race between Labour and the Lib Dems, emphasizing that the SNP and Conservatives aren't able to win in Glasgow North.
